properties.areaDesc: McHenry; Wells; Bottineau; Rolette; Pierce; Sheridan
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 11 at 10:00AM CST until February 12 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck ND
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow
accumulations of one to two inches. Visibility reduced below
one mile in areas of blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 45
mph.

* WHERE...Bottineau, Rolette, McHenry, Pierce, Sheridan, and Wells
counties.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon CST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous
conditions will impact the Wednesday morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dangerously cold wind chills as low as 40
below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little
as 10 minutes.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY
